title: Un-emitted error (in very proc-macro-heavy situation)

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code I'm afraid I don't have time now to minimise this. Steps to reproduce: 1. `git clone https://salsa.debian.org/iwj/otter` 2. `cd otter` 3. `git checkout origin/wip.ice.unemitted-syntax-error` # b87daaac3f524bccb338d7da1491f439a983c3c0 4. `cargo build -p otter-api-tests` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.61.0-nightly (1bfe40d11 2022-03-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1bfe40d11c3630254504fb73eeccfca28d50df52 commit-date: 2022-03-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling otter-api-tests v1.0.0 (/volatile/rustcargo/Otter/Compile-test/otter/apitest) error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted error: expected one of `>` or `as`, found `>>` --> apitest/atmain.rs:386:67 | 386 | -> impl Iterator)>> { | ^^ expected one of `>` or `as` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:508:21 stack backtrace: [elided -iwj] error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.61.0-nightly (1bfe40d11 2022-03-18) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `otter-api-tests` due to previous error ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling otter-api-tests v1.0.0 (/volatile/rustcargo/Otter/Compile-test/otter/apitest) error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted error: expected one of `>` or `as`, found `>>` --> apitest/atmain.rs:386:67 | 386 | -> impl Iterator)>> { | ^^ expected one of `>` or `as` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:508:21 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7fc5c5b7d9dd - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::ha0dcc0dbac37b490 at /rustc/1bfe40d11c3630254504fb73eeccfca28d50df52/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7fc5c5b7d9dd - ::parse_item_impl 28: 0x7fc5c7e22e9d - ::parse_item_common 29: 0x7fc5c7e209b4 - ::parse_mod 30: 0x7fc5c88b8468 - rustc_parse[4f10fec2c3c42d5e]::parse_crate_from_file 31: 0x7fc5c81c8719 - ::time::>, rustc_interface[261c0c4ee18c4905]::passes::parse::{closure#0}> 32: 0x7fc5c81acf2a - rustc_interface[261c0c4ee18c4905]::passes::parse 33: 0x7fc5c81a4996 - ::parse 34: 0x7fc5c816a6b8 - ::enter::, rustc_errors[9a0bab4d6ac1940a]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 35: 0x7fc5c817d91f - rustc_span[187db9b1cfcb079d]::with_source_map::, rustc_interface[261c0c4ee18c4905]::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver[2d9984ec3b69f6c8]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 36: 0x7fc5c816bec4 - rustc_interface[261c0c4ee18c4905]::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver[2d9984ec3b69f6c8]::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 37: 0x7fc5c8168262 - >::set::, rustc_driver[2d9984ec3b69f6c8]::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core[e36ddb4c72619525]::result::Result<(), rustc_errors[9a0bab4d6ac1940a]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 38: 0x7fc5c81666ff - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::hcb71f654c0b0fdfd at /rustc/1bfe40d11c3630254504fb73eeccfca28d50df52/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1853:9 41: 0x7fc5c5b8b3a3 - as core::ops::function::FnOnce>::call_once::h064662d2acfead96 at /rustc/1bfe40d11c3630254504fb73eeccfca28d50df52/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:1853:9 42: 0x7fc5c5b8b3a3 - clone at /build/glibc-fWwxX8/glibc-2.28/misc/../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:95 45: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.61.0-nightly (1bfe40d11 2022-03-18) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `otter-api-tests` due to previous error ```

Stable (1.60.0) does not panic and produces a correct-looking error message: ``` Compiling otter-api-tests v1.0.0 (/volatile/rustcargo/Otter/Compile-test/otter/apitest) error: expected one of `>` or `as`, found `>>` --> apitest/atmain.rs:386:67 | 384 | impl IndexVec> { | - while parsing this item list starting here 385 | fn filter_by_desc_glob(&self, desc_glob: &str) 386 | -> impl Iterator)>> { | ^^ expected one of `>` or `as` ... 399 | } | - the item list ends here error: expected `::` --> apitest/atmain.rs:386:67 | 386 | -> impl Iterator)>> { | ^^ error[E0599]: no method named `filter_by_desc_glob` found for struct `otter_api_tests::IndexVec>` in the current scope --> apitest/atmain.rs:543:10 | 543 | .filter_by_desc_glob("a library load area marker") | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ method not found in `otter_api_tests::IndexVec>` error[E0609]: no field `id` on type `&_` --> apitest/atmain.rs:550:42 | 550 | session.api_piece(GH::With, &llm.id, pos)?; | ^^ error[E0599]: no method named `find_piece_by_desc_glob` found for struct `otter_api_tests::IndexVec>` in the current scope --> apitest/at-bundles.rs:29:29 | 29 | let _: PIA = pieces.find_piece_by_desc_glob(expect); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ method not found in `otter_api_tests::IndexVec>` error[E0599]: no method named `find_by_desc_glob` found for struct `otter_api_tests::IndexVec>` in the current scope --> apitest/at-otter.rs:40:25 | 40 | let hand = a_pieces.find_by_desc_glob(otter::hand::UNCLAIMED_HAND_DESC); | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ method not found in `otter_api_tests::IndexVec>` error[E0599]: no method named `filter_by_desc_glob` found for reference `&otter_api_tests::IndexSlice]>` in the current scope --> apitest/at-otter.rs:51:10 | 51 | .filter_by_desc_glob("* pawn") | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ method not found in `&otter_api_tests::IndexSlice]>` Some errors have detailed explanations: E0599, E0609. For more information about an error, try `rustc --explain E0599`. error: could not compile `otter-api-tests` due to 7 previous errors ```
